SAYS: I'm John Ruffin. I'm talking with David Warnock.
My major focus initially was on the golf committee, the wine committee.

There are a couple of bumps in the road, of course, with everything.
The biggest problem I had with the whole process, frankly, was dealing with people who were not savvy users.

Cleaner, simpler, better is my approach.

Frustrated with the limitations of the mobile app.
Concerned about the lack of institutional memory and continuity in the organization.
